title: Bitter Blood
description: The brand-new Morganville Vampires novel from bestselling author Rachel Caine…Thanks to the eradication of the parasitic creatures known as the draug, the vampires of Morganville have been freed from their usual constraints. With the vampires indulging their every whim, the town’s human population is determined to hold on to their lives by taking up arms. However, college student Claire Danvers isn’t about to take sides—she has ties to both humans and vampires.To make matters worse, a television show arrives in Morganville looking for ghosts just as vampire and human politics collide. Now, Claire and her friends must figure out how to keep the peace without ending up on the nightly news… or worse.
author: Rachel Caine
